speaker: Adina Trufinescu
title: Next-Generation Computer Vision Capabilities with Project Florence
description:
Adina Trufinescu joins Seth today to introduce Introduce Azure Cognitive Service for Vision and the next-generation Computer Vision Capabilities with Florence and walk us through some of the new features! 

Chapters:
00:00 AI Show begins
00:16 Welcome and Intros
00:58 What is Project Florence
01:59 How does a multi-modal model work
08:07 Demo begins
09:05 Dense captions
10:28 Searching for photos with natural language
12:54 Try with your own images
16:40 Video summary and frame locator
21:40 Training dataset
24:43 Learn more
25:25 Wrap
